title: 10/21: Weekend Recap - #2 RBs Dominate (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
From Marlon Mack to Kerryon Johnson to Tarik Cohen to Nick Chubb, it was a great week to own these #2 RBs. Now we have to decide who will be legit going forward. We start with big news (4:40) including Sony Michel's injury and move on to Fantasy Winners (8:22) such as Trey Burton, Mitchell Trubisky and the aforementioned RBs ... Fantasy losers (20:40) including Jordan Reed and a couple of Bears. Then we play Buy or Sell (28:00) for Stefon Diggs, Keenan Allen and even more #2 RBs who could be poised for big second halves ... Reviewing each game with our Fantasy analysis (40:55). Is CLE a tough matchup for QBs? Do you need to add Michael Gallup? Raheem Mostert? ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
